item.title: 3.1 - Reconfigure MySQL
item.description: In this section we’ll update the application configuration to point to our highly-available Lightsail database. From the Lightsail console home page select Databases from the horizontal menu Click on the name of the Lightsail database you created earlier Under Connection details copy the value for Endpoint. In the ToDo application click settings from the top menu Paste in the endpoint value of your Lightsail database under DB Hostname.
